# Mouse Wheelie ![supported Minecraft versions: 1.14 | 1.15 | 1.16 | 1.17](https://img.shields.io/badge/support%20for%20MC-1.14%20%7C%201.15%20%7C%201.16%20%7C%201.17-%2356AD56)

[![curseforge downloads](http://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/full_mouse-wheelie_downloads.svg)](https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/mouse-wheelie)
[![modrinth downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=modrinth&prefix=downloads%20&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/api/v1/mod/u5Ic2U1u&style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/mouse-wheelie)

![](src/main/resources/assets/mousewheelie/icon_large.png?raw=true)

Adds several mouse wheel related actions in gui menus like item scrolling and scrolling through tabs/pages.
